title: April Fools 2021
content:
[[include theme:crayon]]

[[module css]]
#page-title {
    display: none;
}
.feature-block {
    height: 230px;
}
.feature-block .panel-body {
    height: 160px;
    overflow-y: hidden;
}
.feature-block .feature-title {
    font-size: 120%;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.feature-block .feature-subtitle {
    font-size: 90%;
}

.feature-block .feature-title > p,
.feature-block .feature-subtitle > p {
    margin: 0;
}

.news-block .panel-body {
    padding: 0;
}
.news-block .panel-body .alternate {
    padding: 5px 10px;
}

.news-block .news-title {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 110%;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    color: #633;
}
.news-block .news-content {
    margin: 5px 0;
}
.news-block .news-title > p,
.news-block .news-content > p {
    margin: 0;
}


/* Centre image block images in content panels on mobile */
@media (max-width: 960px) and (min-width: 767px), (max-width: 650px) {
  .content-panel .scp-image-block {
    float: none;
    /* Centre, but override inline margin style */
    margin-left: auto !important;
    margin-right: auto !important;
  }
}
[[/module]]



[[=]]
[!-- This image acts as a thumbnail. --]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/250_logo.png width="0" height="0"]]
[[/=]]

[[div style="text-align: center; color: #600;"]]
[[div class="unmargined"]]
WARNING: THE FOUNDATION DATABASE IS
[[/div]]
[[div class="unmargined" style="font-size: 400%; font-weight: bold; margin: 2px 0 5px;"]]
CLASSIFIED
[[/div]]
[[div class="unmargined"]]
ACCESS BY UNAUTHORIZED PERSONNEL IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED
PERPETRATORS WILL BE TRACKED, LOCATED, AND DETAINED
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- * This is commented out until it's needed. * --]
[[div class="content-panel centered standalone"]]


[[/div]]


[!-- [[div class="content-panel centered standalone"]]
[[size 300%]] placeholder text
[[/size]]
[[size 150%]]
placeholder text
[[/size]]


[[/div]] --]

[[div class="content-panel centered standalone"]]
++ i hacked into ur database!!!!!!!!!!
+++ - researcher james, age 6
[[/div]]


[[div class="content-panel centered standalone"]]
+++ This year's 72-hour Jam Contest entries are in! [[[jam-con-2021|Read them here!]]]
[[/div]]




[[div class="feature-block"]]
[[div class="content-panel left-column"]]
[[div class="panel-heading"]]
JamCon Day 1 SCP winner: Rounderhouse
[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-body"]]
[[div class="feature-title"]]
[[[SCP-5479 | SCP-5479: A Movie of You]]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="feature-subtitle"]]
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
[[/div]]

//METATRON.aic is to monitor all film festivals in North America for any mention of GOI-5889.//

[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-footer"]]
[[[Featured SCP Archive II | Featured SCP Archive]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel right-column"]]
[[div class="panel-heading"]]
JamCon Day 1 Tale category winner: DodoDevil
[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-body"]]
[[div class="feature-title"]]
[[[Whalefall]]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="feature-subtitle"]]
by [[user DodoDevil]]
[[/div]]

//The silence continued, unresponding.//

[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-footer"]]
[[[featured-tale-archive-ii | Featured Tale Archive]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel left-column"]]
[[div class="panel-heading"]]
JamCon Day 1 GoI category winner: Ihp
[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-body"]]
[[div class="feature-title"]]
[[[SCP-4612| SCP-4612: Not All Gods Decompose]]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="feature-subtitle"]]
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
[[/div]]

//SCP-4612-B is uncontained at this time, as its whereabouts are unknown.//

[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-footer"]]
[[[Featured GoI Format Archive]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel right-column"]]
[[div class="panel-heading"]]
Reviewers' Spotlight: Limeyy
[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-body"]]
[[div class="feature-title"]]
[[[SCP-5802| SCP-5802: Pollution and Industry]]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="feature-subtitle"]]
by [[user TheAlienBaby]]
[[/div]]

//We're making money, Marshall. That's all that matters. When the fuck has anything other than that concerned you?//

[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-footer"]]
[[[reviewers-spotlight-archive|Reviewers' Spotlight Archive]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="news-block content-panel"]]
[[div class="panel-heading"]]
News
[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-body"]]


[[div class="alternate unmargined"]]
[[div class="news-title"]]
March 14, 2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="news-content"]]
The [[[news-02-2021 | February Edition of the Site News]]] is now live! February was an active month, check out what happened!


[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="alternate unmargined"]]
[[div class="news-title"]]
March 1, 2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="news-content"]]
The winners for the CupidCon2021 contest were announced! Check em out [[[cupid-contest-2021|here!]]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="alternate unmargined"]]
[[div class="news-title"]]
February 5, 2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="news-content"]]
The [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/news-01-2021 January Edition of the Site News] is now live! Check out all the stuff that happened on the site in January!

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="alternate unmargined"]]
[[div class="news-title"]]
January 21, 2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="news-content"]]
The Wanderer's Library is hosting a contest; [http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/scavenger-hunt-contest The Scavenger Hunt 2021 Contest]! Check it out!

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="alternate unmargined"]]
[[div class="news-title"]]
August 27, 2020
[[/div]]
[[div class="news-content"]]
Another site contest on the SCP Wiki is open for entering - go check out the [[[Canon Renaissance Contest]]]!

[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[/div]]

[[div class="panel-footer"]]

[[[Archived News]]]

[[/div]]

[[/div]]


----
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+ What in the H-E-double hockey sticks is this?

This was the front page of the SCP Wiki on 1 April 2021, as part of the Subpar Creative Products April Fool's joke, where Researcher James, age six, took over the Wiki. It has now been immortalized for all time, here on this page. We did a similar thing back in [[[april-fools-2020|2020]]] and [[[april-fools-2014|2014]]], you know.


+ Scribbled on Articles
//All of these were made for April Fool's, but not all images were used during the event.//
